reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Amazing professor! Explains concepts clearly and is very approachable.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Great teacher but her lectures can be a bit fast-paced at times.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but assignments are very challenging without much help.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about history and makes every lecture engaging.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Not the most helpful professor and doesn't seem to care much about students.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Solid lectures, but the lab sessions are poorly organized.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Good lectures, but can be unclear on exam expectations.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Wonderful professor! Very interactive and cares about student success.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Deep thinker and great discussions, but assignments are tough.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: She knows her stuff but can be very hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures, but the grading is a bit tough.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Amazing! She makes literature come alive in her classes.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Not very enthusiastic, but knows the material well.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Lectures feel repetitive, and grading is inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Great professor but can be hard to reach outside of class.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Inspiring professor with a deep love for art and history!

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Tough but fair. You have to be prepared for his classes.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Really challenges you to think critically.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Engaging and relatable, but the workload can be a bit much.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Super engaging and makes a subject like geology fascinating!
